alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:52AM EDT until April 01 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM EDT FOR WOOD AND NORTHWESTERN LUCAS COUNTIES... At 1251 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Temperance to near Bowling Green to near Deshler, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Toledo, Bowling Green, Fostoria, Perrysburg, Oregon, Rossford, Waterville, Northwood, North Baltimore, Holland, Weston, Maumee, Ottawa Hills, Walbridge, Pemberville, Millbury, Haskins, Luckey, Bradner and Wayne. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
